title: Write an Action
description:
Bring together all the parts of programming actions to create a zombie mood meter. This action will take an integer value of the number of hours since the zombie has eaten. Then the action will return text describing the zombie's mood. If the number of hours since eating is less than three, return the text "Calm". If the number of hours is three to six hours, return the text "Hungry". If it's been more than six hours, return "Raging". Once you have written the action, call the action three times in Main with the hours set to 2, 6, and 9. Then, output your zombie's mood results. The program output needs to match the following format.

Zombie Mood: Calm
Zombie Mood: Hungry
Zombie Mood: Raging
hint: Drop in the starter action block and set the parameter info and return type. Then add the if block and set the boolean expression so that each returns either Calm, Hungry, or Raging. Call the action three times and output the results in the proper format.
